title: BRIEF-Talwalkars Healthclubs Defaults On Interest Payment On Loan From Lakshmi Vilas Bank
text:
BRIEF-Talwalkars Healthclubs Defaults On Interest Payment On Loan From Lakshmi Vilas Bank

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 18:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Talwalkars Healthclubs Defaults On Interest Payment On Loan From Lakshmi Vilas Bank Oct 4 (Reuters) - TALWALKARS HEALTHCLUBS LTD: * DEFAULTS ON INTEREST PAYMENT OF 23.8 MILLION RUPEES ON LOAN FROM LAKSHMI VILAS BANK (NS: ) * COMPANY IS IN DISCUSSION WITH BANKERS TO RESTRUCTURE ITS DEBT OBLIGATIONS

BRIEF-Talwalkars Healthclubs Defaults On Interest Payment On Loan From Lakshmi Vilas Bank
